idea:
Strategic Collaborations through GTM Model

In the journey to create a world class collaborative GTM model, we are ready to enable wider reach for new age technologies, designed for every organization that is aspiring to innovate by challenging their status-quo.

We identify global innovators / disruptors and create strategic collaborations to entail a holistic journey for their product or solution, delivering immense business value to the end-customers.

From our experience, several global start-ups are focused on their core product and core market but lack expertise or time to focus on other markets. Our GTM approach helps these start-ups to enable a quick start and is often benefitted from various dimensions of our experience and relationships.
name: TECHERE SOFTWARE PRIVATE LIMITED
